languages.text: "Принять участие в вашей церемонии?" {n}Кибелла задумывается, а затем почтительно кланяется.{/n} "Я... "верну любезность" — так у вас, наверху, говорят? Я буду ждать приглашения".

traits.locale_text: "Твоих, Эним'{name}?" {n}Кибелла задумывается. Наконец, она опускает взгляд.{/n} "Что ж. Я... "верну любезность" — так у вас, наверху, говорят? Я буду ждать приглашения на один из ваших ритуалов".

languages.text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."
languages.original_text: "Принять участие в вашей церемонии?" {n}Кибелла задумывается, а затем почтительно кланяется.{/n} "Я... "верну любезность" — так у вас, наверху, говорят? Я буду ждать приглашения".

traits.locale_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will be waiting for you invitation."

"To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will be waiting for you invitation."

"To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I shall await you invitation."

"To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I shall await you invitation."

"To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

"To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

languages.text: «¿Participar en una de sus ceremonias?». {n}Kibellah se detiene a pensar, y después te ofrece una reverencia respetuosa.{/n} «"Devolver el favor". Así lo expresáis aquí arriba, ¿no es así? Esperaré su invitación».
languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

traits.locale_text: «¿Participar en una de sus ceremonias?». {n}Kibellah se detiene a pensar, y después te ofrece una reverencia respetuosa.{/n} «"Devolver el favor". Así lo expresáis aquí arriba, ¿no es así? Esperaré su invitación».

languages.text: 「あなたたちの式典に参加するために？」{n}キベラは考えるのをやめ、敬意をこめてお辞儀をする。{/n}「『礼儀を返す』…と、ここではそう言うのよね？招待を待っているわ」
languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたたちの式典に参加するために？」{n}キベラは考えるのをやめ、敬意をこめてお辞儀をする。{/n}「『礼儀を返す』…と、ここではそう言うのよね？招待を待っているわ」

languages.text: “参加你的仪式？”{n}绮贝菈顿了顿，思考片刻，之后恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“‘礼尚往来’——你们是这么说的吧？既然如此，我恭候你的邀请。”
languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

traits.locale_text: “参加你的仪式？”{n}绮贝菈顿了顿，思考片刻，之后恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“‘礼尚往来’——你们是这么说的吧？既然如此，我恭候你的邀请。”

languages.text: "Um an einer Eurer Zeremonien teilzunehmen?" {n}Kibellah denkt nach und verbeugt sich dann respektvoll.{/n} "'Einen Gefallen erwidern' – so sagt Ihr doch hier oben, richtig? Ich erwarte Eure Einladung."
languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

traits.locale_text: "Um an einer Eurer Zeremonien teilzunehmen?" {n}Kibellah denkt nach und verbeugt sich dann respektvoll.{/n} "'Einen Gefallen erwidern' – so sagt Ihr doch hier oben, richtig? Ich erwarte Eure Einladung."

languages.text: « Vous m'invitez à participer à l'une de vos cérémonies ? {n}Kibellah s'interrompt pour réfléchir avant de s'incliner respectueusement devant vous.{/n} Échange de bons procédés... C'est bien comme ça que l'on dit chez vous, n'est-ce pas ? Très bien, j'attendrai votre invitation. »
languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

traits.locale_text: « Vous m'invitez à participer à l'une de vos cérémonies ? {n}Kibellah s'interrompt pour réfléchir avant de s'incliner respectueusement devant vous.{/n} Échange de bons procédés... C'est bien comme ça que l'on dit chez vous, n'est-ce pas ? Très bien, j'attendrai votre invitation. »

languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."

languages.text: "Törenlerinden birinde yer almak mı?" {n}Kibellah, düşünmek için duraksıyor. Ardından önünde hürmetle eğiliyor.{/n} "Burada buna 'Nezakete nezaketle karşılık vermek' diyorsunuz, değil mi? Davetini bekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "To partake in one of your ceremonies?" {n}Kibellah pauses to think, then offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "'Returning the courtesy' — that is how you say it up here, isn't it? I will await your invitation."
